metadata.title: CVE-2018-10839 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Qemu emulator <= 3.0.0 built with the NE2000 NIC emulation support is vulnerable to an integer overflow, which could lead to buffer overflow issue. It could occur when receiving packets over the network. A user inside guest could use this flaw to crash the Qemu process resulting in DoS.

criterions.comment: qemu package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:2.12+dfsg-3ubuntu9').
